title: Large-Scale Creative Technology Utilization Workshop for Design Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience in using digital tools and foundational knowledge of elementary education
context.additional_context: Creative technology education for developing design projects linked to elementary social studies curricula

learning_goals: Utilize three or more open-source software tools applicable to design projects
Integrate digital technologies to create elementary social studies educational materials for creative problem-solving
Improve design outcomes through peer feedback processes using collaborative tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
